Author: milkymilquetoast
Text: Thank you so much. Itâ€™s comforting to know that someone else understands how you feel. You too are valid. We can do this.

Author: Scarlet_Flames2
Text: Wow, this resonates. When I reached my LW while I was still a minor, no one cared or said anything; it made me feel invalidated and like I wasn't actually suffering from anything.   I'm glad you're fighting those thoughts. Thanks for posting this letter! And, in case you needed to be reassured, you are valid and you deserve to recover and feel better.
